amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike "or moral convictions" from the material proposed to be inserted by the amendment offered by Mr. Smith of New Jersey.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Mrs. Lowey to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A005).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowey amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 200 (Roll no. 303).
